content:
{"name": "Met Council - UJC of the East Side", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Registration required: can be made online or by going to the food pantry location. Number of household including names and date or birth may be asked.
* Delivery is available for handicapped or seniors who has a hard time walking, please call 212-475-3857.
* Closed during Jewish holidays
* Serves Kosher foods (mostly perishable foods)
* Clients can visit once a month", "email": "", "url": "https://ujceastside.org/food-assistance-nyc", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "15-17 Willett St/Bialystoker Pl", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10002", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7158448, "longitude": -73.9832935}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 475-3857", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "May be closed during Jewish holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Kosher food available"}]}
